These Pictures Of Alia Bhatt Are Proof Why She is One Of The Finest-Looking Actress In Bollywood
These Pictures Of Alia Bhatt Are Proof Why She is One Of The Finest-Looking Actress In Bollywood
Alia Bhatt is one of the finest actress in Bollywood at the moment. She made her Bollywood debut as child in 1999 thriller Sangharsh. After that, she went on to bag a leading role in Karan Johar's Student of the Year (2012). She again colloborated with Johar's production house banner Dharma Productions for 2 States (2014), Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania (2014), and Badrinath Ki Dulhania (2017).
She continued to dominate the box office with her superlative performances. Kapoor & Sons (2016) and Dear Zindagi (2016) showcased her acting skills. She also received critical acclaim for portraying intense characters in Imtiaz Ali's Highway (2014), which won her the Filmfare Critics Award for Best Actress, and the crime drama Udta Punjab (2016), which won her the Filmfare Award for Best Actress. However, it was spy thriller Raazi (2018) that became one of the highest-grossing Bollywood movies and her performance was appreciated across all quarters.

description: Alia Bhatt is an actress and singer of Indian origin and British citizenship, who works in Hindi films. The recipient of several accolades, including two Filmfare Awards, Bhatt is one of the highest-paid actresses in India. Here are some beautiful images of Alia Bhatt:
